text: Guma Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ki fhu, ana Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar fhura ndɨɨi ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ, ana nta kaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ana khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, mba bigi nta fhura ŋanŋangi bigi ma. Maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ki gumgi, mbera mba ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ga ndɨkndɨgɨp nta kaŋgirga.
